user_query: I'm a music enthusiast and I'm looking for songs that have unique and experimental sounds. Can you recommend some avant-garde songs in genres like electronic, ambient, and post-rock? Also, provide me with the details of each song including the artist, duration, and genre.

TaskList.description: Search for avant-garde songs in electronic, ambient, and post-rock genres.
Retrieve detailed information about each recommended song, including artist, duration, and genre.
